statements: SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_data;
SELECT id, address FROM customer_data;
SELECT email, phone FROM customer_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE crm_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email, phone FROM customer_data WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com' AND phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, crm_id FROM customer_data WHERE name LIKE 'J%' OR address LIKE '%Street';
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6) OR crm_id IS NULL ORDER BY id ASC, name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns WHERE total_clicks > 100 AND total_recipients < 500;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, total_conversions FROM email_campaigns WHERE total_clicks > total_recipients;
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customers WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY join_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE total_clicks > 100 AND total_conversions > 50;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN email_campaigns ON customers.customer_id = email_campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT email_id, email_subject FROM EmailMarketing WHERE send_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, crm_id FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, acquisition_rate, retention_rate FROM Analytics WHERE marketing_channel = 'Paid Search';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE crm_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT email_subject, send_date FROM EmailMarketing WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY send_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_content FROM Customers JOIN EmailMarketing ON Customers.customer_id = EmailMarketing.customer_id WHERE Customers.customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Analytics WHERE acquisition_rate > 0.5 AND retention_rate < 0.4 ORDER BY analytics_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT email_id, email_subject FROM emails WHERE send_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY send_date ASC;
SELECT tracking_id, recipient_email FROM email_tracking WHERE delivery_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT email_subject, send_date FROM emails WHERE send_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT email_id, recipient_email FROM email_tracking WHERE delivery_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM products ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
